name: Grilled Tofu, with Chipotle Aioli

ingredients.name: extra-firm tofu
ingredients.additionalInstruction: cut into 1" blocks, drained well on paper towels

preparation: Combine soy sauce, maple syrup, lemon juice and sesame oil, add Tofu and coat well. Marinate at least one hour.
Pre-heat grill to medium. Lay tofu out. Cook for 3â€“5 minutes per side. Using a basting brush, baste with remaining marinade.
Serve with aioli on the side.
tips: If you have time, boil the Tofu in water for 2 minutes and drain well on paper towels before adding to marinade, this will bring out the best flavour of the Tofu.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve hot with a variety of grilled vegetables.
